resources.string:
Use GovSecureID on your smartphone to log in to websites easily and securely.

Enhance the security of your govConext login. When an application requires the use of govSecureID, please follow the instructions for activation as shown in the web browser

During the activation process you have to scan a QR code. Press Scan when asked.

Use govSecureID on your smartphone to log in

1. Open the govSecureID push message or press Scan and scan the QR-code on the website.

2. Scan your biometric or enter your PIN for govSecureID and press OK

3. You are logged in!
For scanning a QR code, govSecureID needs access to the camera.
Choose a unique PIN for govSecureID
